metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38712 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Libreswan 3.x and 4.x before 4.12. When an IKEv1ISAKMP SA Informational Exchange packet contains a Delete/Notify payloadfollowed by further Notifies that act on the ISAKMP SA, such as aduplicated Delete/Notify message, a NULL pointer dereference on the deletedstate causes the pluto daemon to crash and restart.

criterions.comment: libreswan package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
